synthesis_conditions.step: Preparation of single crystals of clathrates
synthesis_conditions.solvents: methanolic solution of guest molecules and K2[Pt(CN)4], aqueous solution containing [Fe(SO4)2(NH4)2]Â·6 H2O and pz

synthesis_conditions.equipment: Quantachrome AUTOSORB-1, BELSORP-18 volumetric adsorption equipment from BEL Japan, Inc.
synthesis_conditions.notes: For CO2, O2, N2, H2O, and benzene

synthesis_conditions.conditions: treatment under reduced pressure (<10-2 Pa) at 400 K for more than 2 h

synthesis_conditions.sample_preparation: samples placed in a glass tube and fixed to the end of the sample transport rod; guest-free sample prepared by evacuating the SQUID sample chamber at 293 K for 2 h

synthesis_conditions.equipment: Rigaku Varimax CCD system, Nonius Kappa-CCD single-crystal diffractometer
synthesis_conditions.temperature_control: temperature kept constant under flowing N2
synthesis_conditions.analysis: solved by a standard direct method and expanded using Fourier techniques; full-matrix least-squares refinements with anisotropic thermal parameters for all non-hydrogen atoms; hydrogen atoms placed in calculated positions and refined using a riding model
